title: #464 Ernest with Kerryn Feehan
itunes:title: Ernest with Kerryn Feehan
description:
Ernest was a good dog. The best. 

Standup comedian Kerryn Feehan talks to dog owner and comedian Ari Shaffir about her special little guy Ernest. This is a really sad episode. But I felt like it was a proper eulogy to one of the pure souls on this earth. He really was amazing. 

Subscribe on YouTube 

Listen to Skeptic Tank  

Instagram - @arishaffir 

Join Ari's Patreon 

Cool merch & more

For more Kerryn Feehan:

Instagram - @kerrynfeehan  

Twitter - @KFreehams 

YouTube - Kerryn Feehan

 

The Music:

Dierks Bentley - Can’t Be Replaced

Florence and the Machine - Dog Days Are Over

Chris Stapleton - Maggie’s Song

Red Foley - Old Shep

Thank you to our sponsors! Head to AllFido.com and use code "Ari15" for 15% off your order for your pups health and wellness!

And for your own health and wellness head to 3Chi.com and use code "Ari" for 5% off Delta 8 products.
